value.stringValue:
Hi {!$Record.FirstName},

Thank you for submitting your application for a reduced retainer though our SimpleStart program. We want to let you know that you do not qualify for a reduced retainer at this time. While you don’t qualify for our SimpleStart program, we would still love to work with you and to help you with your family law case using our standard retainer for the attorney/LLP you selected:

Name: {!$Record.Phone_Attorney_First_Name_A__c} {!$Record.Phone_Attorney_Last_Name_A__c}

Standard Retainer : {!$Record.Quoted_Retainer__c}

Phone : {!$Record.Phone_Attorney_Mobile_A__c}

Email : {!$Record.Phone_Attorney_Email_A__c}

Someone from our team will also reach out to get things started if we haven't heard from you. If you have questions or concerns before hiring us, we're happy to chat more first.

If you have more questions about our SimpleStart™ Program, our finance team is happy to help.

Sincerely,

Modern Family Law

(866) 409-3025

ModernFamilyLaw.com
